price: 46. Mise ma waxaad weydiisataa ujro, sidaa awgeed bay la culaabeysan yihiin deyn?
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
